mapper.select: select t.provinceid "provinceid", t.provincename "provincename" from l_province t where 1=1
select t.cityid "cityid", t.cityname "cityname" from l_city t where 1=1 and t.provinceid=#{provinceid}
select t.countyid "countyid", t.countyname "countyname" from l_county t where 1=1 and t.cityid=#{cityid}
select t.groupid "groupid", t.groupname "groupname" from l_group t where 1=1 and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid}
select t.companyid "companyid", t.companyname "companyname" from l_company t where 1=1 and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid}

select t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.graindepotname "graindepotname" from l_graindepot t where 1=1 and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid}
select t.grainid "grainid", t.graincateid "graincateid", t.grainname "grainname", t.grainkind "grainkind", t.gbgraincode "gbgraincode", t.orderno "orderno" from l_grain t where 1=1 order by t.orderno

select t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.grainattrcode "grainattrcode", t.grainattrname "grainattrname", t.gbgrainattrcode "gbgrainattrcode", t.orderno "orderno" from l_grainattr t where 1=1 order by t.orderno

SELECT t.traderid "traderid", t.tradername "tradername", t.traderaddress "traderaddress", t.telnumber "telnumber", t.tradernature "tradernature", t.taxnature "taxnature", t.createtime "createtime" FROM l_trader t where 1=1 and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
SELECT conttypeid "conttypeid", conttypename "conttypename", buysellflag "buysellflag" FROM l_contracttype where 1=1 and buysellflag=#{buysellflag}
select t.storagestructureid "storagestructureid", t.storagestructurename "storagestructurename" from l_storagestructure t where 1=1 order by t.orderno
select t.storagetypeid "storagetypeid", t.storagetypename "storagetypename" from l_storagetype t where 1=1 order by t.orderno
select t.storageid "storageid", t.storagename "storagename", t.defgrainid "defgrainid" from l_storage t where 1=1 and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} order by t.storagecode
select t.settleid "settleid", t.settlename "settlename" from l_settle t

select t.accid "accid", t.accname "accname" from l_account t where 1=1 and t.accid=#{accid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.acccode=#{acccode} and t.accname=#{accname} and t.acctype=#{acctype} and t.bankname=#{bankname} and t.bankaccno=#{bankaccno} and t.accinitbala=#{accinitbala} and t.accbala=#{accbala} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.sequno=#{sequno} order by t.sequno
select t.menuid "menuid", t.title "title" from base_menu t where 1=1 order by t.menuid
select t.ugroupid "ugroupid", t.ugroupname "ugroupname" from base_ugroup t where 1=1
select t.equiptypename "equiptypename", t.equiptypeid "equiptypeid" from c_equiptype t where 1=1 and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid}
select t.drugkindname "drugkindname", t.drugkindid "drugkindid" from d_drugkind t where 1=1 and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid}
select t.planname "planname", t.outplanid "outplanid" from b_planfile_outplan t where 1=1 and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid}
select t.brand "brand", t.drugid "drugid" from d_drug t where 1=1 and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid}
select t.truckid "truckid", t.trucknum "trucknum" from l_truck t where 1=1 and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid}
